title: CAD Market in the Aerospace and Defense Industry in APAC 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 1:19 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About CAD 
Computer-aided design (CAD) is a software tool for modeling and designing products and components with ease and accuracy. The software package helps engineers, architects, and other design professionals to digitally prototype products prior to production, and draft industry-specific products.The automotive, aerospace and defense, industrial machinery, and electrical and electronics industries use CAD solutions. These solutions enable end-users to digitally prototype their products before production.Technavio's analysts forecast the CAD market in the aerospace and defense industry in APAC to grow at a CAGR of 7.29% during 2014-2019. Covered in this Report Technavio's report, CAD Market in the Aerospace and Defense Industry in APAC 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the Key Vendors operating in this market. Key Vendors
